name: 1.85.0-beta.1
body:
## :sparkles:  Features 

- App initialization is faster thanks to code and query optimizations
- Make dataproxy search working on mobile
- Handle offline mode in Flagship app

## :wrench:  Tech

- The search and assistant code is now mutualized through the dataproxy-lib
- Libraries upgrades
- Code cleanup

## What's Changed
* fix(Assistant): Now exclude realtime message if not relevant by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/pull/2240
* feat(search): Change search attribute names by @Ldoppea in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/pull/2241
* feat: Bump version to 1.83.0 by @Ldoppea in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/pull/2242
* feat(Assistant): Use new getByIds methods to fetch sources by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/pull/2243
* feat(Assistant): Force "normal" variant for searchbar and dialogs by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/pull/2244

name: 1.81.0-beta.1
body:
### ‚ú® Features

* Show announcements
* Replace animated wallpaper by static one

### üîß Tech

* Add Sentry
* Update @sentry/react from 7.118.0 to 7.119.0
* Update cozy-client from 48.8.0 to 48.17.0
* Update cozy-harvest-lib from 27.0.1 to 29.1.1
* Update cozy-ui from 111.0.0 to 111.9.0
* Update cozy-flags from 3.2.2 to 4.0.0

### üêõ Bug Fixes

* Remove brightness filter on secondary footer logos

## ‚ú® Features

* Improved animations on mobile devices
* Enabled the possibility to use detailed view for Services
* Added new default wallpaper

## üêõ Bug Fixes

* The color of the message for empty services is now theme-responsive
* Fixed a crash of the viewer inside the harvest modal in some cases
* Submit 2FA on the 2FA submit button click
* Improved CSS grid for responsiveness
* Micro-adjusted CSS for background in some cases:
  * Moved custom wallpaper after empty div for overrides
  * Background wasn't fullscreen in browsers with small screens
  * Scrollbar was over the content
* Added multiple improvements to shortcuts grids

## üîß Tech

* Updated `cozy-ui` from `110.8.1` to `110.8.2`
* Updated `cozy-harvest-lib` from `27.0.0` to `27.0.1`
* Replaced deprecated `Alerter` with the latest version

### ‚ú® Features
- Updated cozy-harvest-lib to version 22.5.11 to enhance data harvesting capabilities.
- Adopted Node 20 for better performance and new features.
- Upgraded cozy-ui from version 103.12.0 to 106.3.0, adding new UI components and improvements.
- Introduced detailed and compact section views, providing more display options.
- Added customization options for sections, allowing users to tailor the interface to their needs.
- Improved dark mode support for a more consistent visual experience in low-light environments.
- Enhanced dark mode with new cozy-ui updates for better visual contrast.
- Introduced CozyDevTools, offering advanced debugging and development tools.
- Added a group section mode, facilitating better organization and display of grouped items.
- Updated cozy-ui to version 110.1.0, bringing the latest UI enhancements.

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- Updated harvest to version 23.0.0 to resolve data synchronization issues.
- Further refined harvest to version 23.0.1, fixing minor bugs and improving stability.
- Removed redundant color-scheme settings, reverting to default values for better consistency.
- Reintroduced color-scheme settings to resolve display issues.
- Adjusted background image darkness in dark mode to improve readability.

### üîß Tech
- Reworked the logic for background classes to optimize performance and maintainability.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cozy/cozy-home/compare/1.75.0...1.77.0

    Perf improvement to display the image. No need to wait the end of a http request to display them
    Now listen also for the shortcuts to be loaded before sending the "isReady" state. (should keep the splascreen on flagship app more longer if there is a lot of shortcuts. But this way, we avoid visual inconveniences. Should be visible on Ma Bulle with a grd_lyon cozy.

name: 1.57.0-beta.1
body: Fix store intent for Banking & OAuth konnector

-     Realtime error on connectors during execution if Harvest was closed before the end of the run
-     Fixed reconnection of a bank account that was in "user action needed". This will relaunch the connector rather than opening Powens, which displays an error.
-     "Synchronizing" in Harvest's "..." also launches the powen reconnection flow if that's who you need to call
-     Paywall on number of accounts (to be enabled by flags)
-     Home now sends to flagship app if it's in inverted or light theme (needs a compatible flagship app version for this to work).
-     Display of a message telling the user not to leave the AA when he has launched a CCC.
-     Fix showed when the home is displayed in the flagship app
-     Display the SuccessModal after connecting a banking konnector

name: 1.56.0-beta.2
body:
- Realtime error on connectors during execution if Harvest was closed before the end of the run 
- Fixed reconnection of a bank account that was in "user action needed". This will relaunch the connector rather than opening Powens, which displays an error.
- "Synchronizing" in Harvest's "..." also launches the powen reconnection flow if that's who you need to call
- Paywall on number of accounts (to be enabled by flags)
- Home now sends to flagship app if it's in inverted or light theme (needs a compatible flagship app version for this to work).
- Display of a message telling the user not to leave the AA when he has launched a CCC.
- Fix showed when the home is displayed in the flagship app
- Display the SuccessModal after connecting a banking konnector

name: 1.56.0-beta.1
body:
- Realtime error on connectors during execution if Harvest was closed before the end of the run (we still have the problem of bad data on the Home in the flagship app with a connector that can still be displayed while running, while it's OK on the web). 
- Fixed reconnection of a bank account that was in "user action needed". This will relaunch the connector rather than opening Powens, which displays an error.
- "Synchronizing" in Harvest's "..." also launches the powen reconnection flow if that's who you need to call 
- Paywall on number of accounts (to be enabled by flags) 
- Home now sends to flagship app if it's in inverted or light theme (needs a compatible flagship app version for this to work). 
- Display of a message telling the user not to leave the AA when he has launched a CCC.

### ‚ú® Features

* Show time on last update with a tooltip
* Replace cozy-ui css by cozy-ui.utils css
* Adjust harvest banner style for desktop and mobile
* Open File in New Tab (Cmd+Click or Right-Click)
* Invert `drive.show-nextcloud-dev` to `drive.hide-nextcloud-dev` so the feature is activated by default
* Remove `drive.show-favorites-dev`
* Hide apps by `apps.hidden` flag

### üêõ Bug Fixes

* Opening note inside public repository

### üîß Tech

* Add CI with Github Actions
* Now load cozy-ui utils css after cozy-ui component css
* Update @sentry/react from 7.118.0 to 7.119.0
* Update cozy-client from 48.13.1 to 49.8.0
* Update cozy-harvest-lib from 29.0.0 to 29.1.1
* Update cozy-bar from 14.0.0 to 16.0.1
* Update filesize from 3.6.1 to 10.1.6
* Update cozy-intent from 2.22.0 to 2.23.0
* Update cozy-ui from 111.12.0 to 111.21.0

body:
### üêõ Bug Fixes

* Show Drives instead Drive into sidebar when there is shared drives

### üîß Tech

* Update cozy-sharing from 13.2.0 to 13.3.0

### ‚ú® Features

* Replace the qualification modal from `cozy-scanner` to `cozy-client` and `cozy-ui` and improve its UX
* Show external drives from NextCloud connector
* Share file to dynamic group of recipient behind the flag `sharing.show-group-recipients`
* Add an action in the notification to go to the destination folder after a move 

### üêõ Bug Fixes

* We had a bug that caused an issue where if we wanted to open a shortcut from the preview page, it wouldn't work
* Hide time on line to add a folder

### üîß Tech

* Upgrade nvmrc to 20
* Remove `cozy-scanner` package

* Update `cozy-bar` from `12.2.1` to `12.2.3`

name: 1.10.0-beta.1
body:
* üêõ: Realtime communication does now reconnect when the computer wake up from sleep
* üîß: Rewrite of the realtime code. It should fix most problems with collaboration.
* üîß: Update of sharing code

- ‚ú®: Allows cozy-Drive or cozy-Desktop to fill the username of the user when using a shared note. This will allow recipients of a shared note to have their own initials on cursors
- üêõ: The saving indicator in the lower right corner shows the correct age for the latest edition
- üîß: Better wordings in the saving indicator in the lower right corner

name: 1.9.0-beta.1
body:
- ‚ú®: Allows cozy-Drive or cozy-Desktop to fill the username of the user when using a shared note. This will allow recipients of a shared note to have their own initials on cursors
- üêõ: The saving indicator in the lower right corner shows the correct age for the latest edition
- üîß: Better wordings in the saving indicator in the lower right corner

- ‚ú®: New public routes so that drive can open  a  shared note  from a shared folder, both from web and from desktop
- ‚ú®: Automatic read-only mode based on current permissions
- üêõ: Going back to the root folder or the  trash folder of the app Drive is now fixed
- üêõ: Better english translations for the saving indicator
- üîß: Adds debug data to help find client's bug
- üîß: Various dependencies update

name: 1.20.0-beta.1
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: Update DataList and AppList headers by @vdnj in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-settings/pull/541
* fix: display storage data in gigabyte by @acezard in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-settings/pull/543
* fix: Export Link by @Crash-- in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-settings/pull/544

### :sparkles: Features

* Improve navigation menu
* Add biometry in menu when user is in AA
* Remove premium link in menu when user is in AA
* Improve responsive view for "Connected devices"
* Automates Cozy destroy
* (Behind flag) Add permissions dashboard
* feat: pinCode activation also sets autoLock to true by @acezard in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-settings/pull/534
* feat: Add separators in AppPermissions on mobile display by @vdnj in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-settings/pull/535

### :wrench: Tech

* Renew github token for CI
* Remove matomo tracking
* Upgrade dependencies (cozy-ui, cozy-client, cozy-interapp, cozy-realtime, cozy-scripts, react-redux)
* Update IRC link

name: 1.10.0-beta.1
body:
## What's Changed
* feat: Adjust some color to be more dark mode compliant by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/990
* Add better support for dark mode by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/992
* fix: Move custom theme CSS at end of <head> by @zatteo in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/993
* feat: Upgrade packages by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/994
* Group menu in contact is now theme responsive by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/998
* feat: Upgrade cozy-ui and add realtime on io.cozy.settings by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/999
* feat: Adjust style the toolbar and wording buttons in it by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/1000


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/compare/1.9.0...1.10.0-beta.1

## What's Changed
* fix: Creation group with Safari by @Merkur39 in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/967
* feat: Upgrade cozy-ui 103.6.1 to 105.6.0 + cozy-client 45.12.0 to 46.6.0 by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/969
* Add additionalName, surname and region fields by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/970
* Use client.destroy from new cozy-client by @zatteo in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/968
* Label rework on phone/address/email/cozy input by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/971
* refactor: Adjust size of contact form field delete button by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/973
* feat: Use new Select button on mobile by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/974
* feat(Labels): Check `home` for undefined label with defined type by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/976
* Fix keepIndexFullNameAndDisplayNameUpToDate service by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/977
* feat(Labels): Check `home` if no label by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/978
* Add autoDefineLabels by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/979
* fix(Services): AutoDefineLabel should not modify existing correct contact by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/980
* feat: Can now deal with `[null]` value for address/phone/email/cozy by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/981
* fix(deps): update dependency cozy-app-publish to ^0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/982
* Form inputs wasn't removed when clicking delete icon if last value by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/984
* Feat: Add related contact field (with metadata) by @Merkur39 in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/985
* feat: Add redirection for unsupported routes by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/986
* feat: Remove custom input on form label options when already customized by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/987
* Better display support for long content in labels by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/988
* feat: Adjust related contact input style by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/989
* fix: Show remove logic in contact form by @JF-Cozy in https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/pull/991


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cozy/cozy-contacts/compare/1.8.0...1.9.0-beta.1

### ‚ú® Features

* Make some fields mandatory for creation

### üîß Tech

* Use CozyDevTools instead FlagSwitcher
* Upgrade cozy-bar from 7.17.9 to 11.0.0

name: 1.10.0-beta.1
body:
### ‚ú® Features

* Modify the download link for the Flagship application to adapt it to white labels

### üêõ Bug Fixes

* Hide filters everywhere except on the discover page

### ‚ú® Features

* Update `INSTALL` Intent, this Intent can now redirect to 2 additional pages, with `pageToDisplay` & `category` option.
  In the case of a `slug` with `pageToDisplay: "details"` are defined, this Intent opens cozy-store on the konnector/app details page, instead of the permissions page.

### üêõ Bug Fixes

* Selected category doesn't overflow anymore from the Sidebar
* Selected category is not lost anymore when selecting an App
* Search filter and other filters are not lost anymore when selecting an App

### ‚ú® Features

* Upgrade cozy-ui from 77.7.1 to 79.3.0, cozy-client from 30.0.0 to 34.1.5

* Update French search placeholder translation
* Make discover the default route
* Make redirect route working with react-router v6

* Remove flag store.search
* Update outdated link to our IRC channel in doc
* Fix test on IntentRedirect
